item.description:
We have a lot of musicians in the group, and the last one of these was highly enjoyable, so we're well overdue for a second go around.
If you can play an instrument (something portable, hopefully) or sing, and feel like just getting together and jamming, show up. :) If you are horribly shy about your musical skills and still want to come, show up.
Genres were diverse, including rock/folk/pop etc.. jazz standards may come into play, too.

I'll serve nibbles and some libations. If you have something special you like, you're welcome to bring it.

Call if you want more details: 860 465 9044

Space is limited, so be serious if you RSVP yes ;)
item.how_to_find_us: White colonial house in the historic district of Chaplin Center

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Another Jam Session @ Victoria's
